name: Yuli Wang
title: Data Visualization Designer & Developer
bio: I am a designer and developer focused on data visualization and interactive storytelling. I am passionate about transforming complex data into intuitive, engaging visual experiences.

job1.title: Senior Data Visualization Designer
job1.description: Responsible for designing and developing interactive data visualizations, providing data insights and storytelling solutions for clients.

job2.title: Data Analyst
job2.description: Responsible for data collection, cleaning, and analysis to support business decisions.
